text: Ba bandi bameneshejwe mu ngo zabo barenganyijwe, nta kindi bazira uretse gusa kuba baremeye Imana bavuga bati “Nyagasani wacu ni Allah.” Nyamara iyo Allah ataza kurinda abantu (akarengane) akoresheje abandi, inzu z’abihayimana, insengero, amasinagogi ndetse n’imisigiti ivugirwamo izina rya Allah kenshi, byari gusenywa. Kandi rwose Allah azatabara abaharanira idini rye. Mu by’ukuri Allah ni Umunyembaraga, Umunyacyubahiro bihebuje
